description: TRANSCRIPT of videoconference bench trial proceedings, Vol 3 held on 05-08-2020, before Judge Henry Coke Morgan Jr., Court Reporter/Transcriber Carol Naughton, Telephone number,757-222-7073. NOTICE RE REDACTION OF TRANSCRIPTS:The parties have thirty(30) calendar days to file with the Court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no such Notice is filed, the transcript will be made remotely electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days. The policy is located on our website at www.vaed.uscourts.gov. Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the court reporter/transcriber before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through PACER Redaction Request due 9/9/2020. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 10/13/2020. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 11/9/2020.(naughton, carol) (Entered: 08/10/2020)
